pullrequest.title: Add Insert tab to model editor

content.raw:
* Hrm, good question. For me personally, the insert menu would be more appealing as default because it's easier to understand what it is. The scene tree is potentially overwhelming for new users. On the other hand, most of the control is in the scene tree, so perhaps that's what people want to see most often. One day when we have customizable configurations, this can be a user-selected parameter. Is there a way to see a screenshot of what the insert tab looks like in this PR?

* Do you mean that the custom and simple shapes are single-link, whereas the other models are multi-link?
content.html:
• Hrm, good question. For me personally, the insert menu would be more appealing as default because it's easier to understand what it is. The scene tree is potentially overwhelming for new users. On the other hand, most of the control is in the scene tree, so perhaps that's what people want to see most often. One day when we have customizable configurations, this can be a user-selected parameter. Is there a way to see a screenshot of what the insert tab looks like in this PR?

  • Do you mean that the custom and simple shapes are single-link, whereas the other models are multi-link?
